org.mapdb

Interface CC


  • public interface CC
    Compiler Configuration. There are some static final boolean fields, which describe features MapDB was compiled with.

    MapDB can be compiled with/without some features. For example fine logging is useful for debuging, but should not be present in production version. Java does not have preprocessor so we use Dead code elimination to achieve it.

    Typical usage: 

         if(CC.ASSERT && arg==null){
         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Argument is null");
     }
    Author:
    Jan Kotek

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean ASSERT
      Compile with basic assertions (boundaries, non null...).
      static boolean FULL_TEST
      MapDB has acceptance tests which may take long time to finish (week!!!).
      static boolean LOG_LOCKS
      Log lock/unlock events.
      static boolean LOG_TRACE
      Compile with fine trace logging statements (Logger.debug and Logger.trace).
      static boolean PARANOID
      Compile even with more assertions and verifications.

    • Field Detail

      • FULL_TEST

        static final boolean FULL_TEST
        MapDB has acceptance tests which may take long time to finish (week!!!). For daily development it makes sense to disable it.. This flag controls if full test suite is ran.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ASSERT

        static final boolean ASSERT
        Compile with basic assertions (boundaries, non null...).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARANOID

        static final boolean PARANOID
        Compile even with more assertions and verifications. For example HashMap may check if keys implements hash function correctly. This may slow down MapDB thousands times
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOG_TRACE

        static final boolean LOG_TRACE
        Compile with fine trace logging statements (Logger.debug and Logger.trace).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOG_LOCKS

        static final boolean LOG_LOCKS
        Log lock/unlock events. Useful to diagnose deadlocks
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
